name: Doctor Strange

abilities.name: Bolts of Balthakk
abilities.details: Fires precise bolts of mystical energy.

abilities.name: Mystic Portal
abilities.details: Creates two linked portals. Allies and Strange can travel through instantly. Lasts ~15 seconds.

abilities.name: Eye of Agamotto
abilities.details: Reveals enemies hit for ~5 seconds and applies a brief 'Slow' debuff.

ultimate.name: Sorcerer Supreme
ultimate.effect: Damages enemies and 'rewinds' their position back several seconds.
ultimate.details: Channels reality-warping magic after a brief cast time.

passives.name: Levitation
passives.details: Can hover or float slowly for a limited duration.

teamups.effect: Enemies revealed by Eye of Agamotto take slightly increased damage from magic sources.

lore: Dr. Stephen Strange was a brilliant but arrogant surgeon who lost the use of his hands. Seeking healing, he found the Ancient One and became the Sorcerer Supreme, Earth's primary protector against mystical threats.

comics.title: Doctor Strange (various series, particularly by Lee/Ditko, Aaron)
